title: Opening Event: Mirroring China’s Past—Emperors and Their Bronzes
hero_caption: <p><em>Bell </em>(nao), first half of the Zhou dynasty (about 10th–7th century BC). China, probably Hunan province. Lucy Maud Buckingham Collection.</p>
description:
The Asian Art Council Board of Directors invites you to celebrate the opening of Mirroring China’s Past: Emperors and Their Bronzes with cocktails and exhibition viewing in Regenstein Hall and dinner in Griffin Court. Please use the Michigan Avenue entrance.

>TicketsPatron Table: $10,000
(premier seating for ten, exhibition catalogue, recognition in the event program)Sponsor Table: $5,000
(preferred seating for ten, recognition in the event program)Individual Ticket: $500

All proceeds go to the Acquisition Support Fund for the Department of Asian Art.

For more information, contact Elyse Strand at (312) 443-3782 or aac@artic.edu.

This event is supported by Sothebys.
